about_the_game:
Experience this original story inspired by true events. A man's camping trip is going great until in the night his dog Hobbs runs away. Play as Hobbs and find him back to his home. Experience an original soundtrack, melancholic environments, and challenge as Getting Hobbs home in one piece won't be easy. on the way is danger and difficulty. But with enough heart and dedication Hobbs may just end up back where he belongs!

The gameplay of Hobbs Home is a story based precision platformer. Explore the different levels for hidden objects and new mechanics and watch interlaced cutscenes frame your ultimate goal and its conclusion.

• 15 Unique Hand Crafted Levels
• Hundreds Of Platforming Challenge Combinations
• Tight platforming including spikes ,water ,disappearing rocks, moving and shifting clouds
• 3 Different Areas (Forgotten Forest, Creaking Caves, Blistering Blizzards)
• Don't forget to try and collect all 150 hidden bones!
• 1-2 Hours of journey with countless Speedrunning potential
• 5 Different Difficult Achievements to show off
• Dynamic Lighting System, Speedrunning Support, Save Slots, Controller Support, and more

name: Hobbs Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: As an escape a man goes out into the wilderness for a nice relaxing camping trip. All is going great until in the middle of the night his curious dog finds himself lost in the forest. Playing as the dog Hobbs you'll experience challenging platforming gameplay as you attempt to get him home.
